title: (x) Hudson's Bay flyer/Old Navy signage font - Chalet London 1960 {Miguel}
content:
Sorry for the crappy sample but this is the best I could do. It is a cross between helvetica and avant garde maybe. Notice the curved “t” and the “a”  
any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090715155136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hbc.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090715155136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hbc2.png)
author: pozniak
